rooms.name: Kokiri Forest
rooms.description: A small village full of life and wonder, befit for the Kokiri people. The village is surrounded by a dense forest, with a large tree looming in the background.

rooms.name: Lost Woods Entrance
rooms.description: As you pass through the entrance you see 3 more paths. One to the left, one to the right, and one straight ahead. Becareful not to get lost in the fog, or you may find yourself back at the entrance.

rooms.name: Woods 01
rooms.description: An unsuspecting wooded area, indistinguisable from the rest of the forest.

rooms.name: Woods 02
rooms.description: An unsuspecting wooded area, indistinguisable from the rest of the forest.

rooms.description: An unsuspecting wooded area, indistinguisable from the rest of the forest.

rooms.description: An unsuspecting wooded area, indistinguisable from the rest of the forest.

rooms.name: Bellow the Bridge
rooms.description: A hidden path leads you to a small clearing under the bridge. You see a small deku scrub in the far corner of the clearing.

rooms.name: Woods 08
rooms.description: An unsuspecting wooded area, indistinguisable from the rest of the forest.

rooms.name: Sacred Forest Meadow Entrance
rooms.description: A large temple in the middle of the woods can be seen in the background. The area is guarded by several monsters hidden throughout a short maze.

rooms.name: Zora's River
rooms.description: A long winding river infested with monsters. The Zora people live at the end of the river where the water is the cleanest.

rooms.name: Goron City
rooms.description: Goron City is home to the Goron people, led by their Boss. There are a few shops, an inn, and more to be found in the city.

rooms.name: Sacred Forest Meadow Exit
rooms.description: As you reach the end of the maze you see the stairs leading to the temple. Several of Ganon's minions are guarding the entrance.

rooms.name: Forest Temple
rooms.description: The Forest Temple is a large temple with many rooms and puzzles to solve. You've reached the end of the maze! Congrats!

monsters.name: Wolfos
monsters.description: A bipedal wolf with sharp claws, teeth, and glowing red eyes

monsters.name: Skullkid
monsters.description: A figure dressed in a red cloak and hat covering an underlayer of clothing composed of a straw-like material, and play a flute, which they can also use as a weapon to shoot projectiles. Local say they are kids who got lost in the woods.

monsters.name: Curious Skullkid
monsters.description: A figure dressed in a red cloak and hat covering an underlayer of clothing composed of a straw-like material, and play a flute, which they can also use as a weapon to shoot projectiles. Local say they are kids who got lost in the woods.

monsters.name: Shopkeeper Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, he seems to be trying to sell you something.

monsters.name: Ninja Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Dumb Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Suspicious Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Agitated Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Skulltula
monsters.description: A fierce spider with a skull covering the top of it's exoskeleton. It's eyes glow yellow in the darkness.

monsters.name: Blue Tektite
monsters.description: A spider-like creature with a hard shell and four legs. They are known to jump great distances to attack their prey.

monsters.name: Red Tektite
monsters.description: A spider-like creature with a hard shell and four legs. They are known to jump great distances to attack their prey.

monsters.name: Octorok
monsters.description: A creature with a round body and a single eye. They are known to shoot rocks at their prey from their mouths.

monsters.name: Buff Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Sleepy Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Angry Deku Scrub
monsters.description: A plant-based creature that has skin seemingly made of wood and hair. Their 'clothing' is made of leaves and flowers, and spit Deku Nuts at their enemies when threatened

monsters.name: Moblin Bumayu
monsters.description: A large, muscular creature with a pig-like face and a large spear. They are known to be very aggressive towards people when spotted.

monsters.name: Moblin Dunblin
monsters.description: A large, muscular creature with a pig-like face and a large spear. They are known to be very aggressive towards people when spotted.

monsters.name: Moblin Hogblin
monsters.description: A large, muscular creature with a pig-like face and a large spear. They are known to be very aggressive towards people when spotted.

monsters.name: Great Moblin Gorblin
monsters.description: A larger, more muscular version of the Moblin with a large club that creates shock waves. They are known to be the leaders of the Moblin tribes.
